LanguageData.AvaliKiriFruit.label: Kiri fruit
LanguageData.AvaliKiriFruit.description: The fruiting body of a subterranean slime mold.
LanguageData.AvaliNakatiOvoid.label: Nakati ovoid
LanguageData.AvaliNakatiOvoid.description: A biolumiscent ovoid, eventually this'll grow into a colony.
LanguageData.AvaliPiruColony.label: Piru colony
LanguageData.AvaliPiruColony.description: Small, barnacle-like colonies which grow long frond-like feeding filaments.
